text: itchyny さんが報告してくれた vim-go のバグ、再現してくれたみたいで良かった。 <https://github.com/fatih/vim-go/issues/2383>

attachments.fallback: GitHub: go.mod file is mixed when using vim-go in multiple projects · Issue #2383 · fatih/vim-go
attachments.title: go.mod file is mixed when using vim-go in multiple projects · Issue #2383 · fatih/vim-go
attachments.text: What did you do? (required: The issue will be closed when not provided) $ export GO111MODULE=on $ killall gopls $ go get -u <http://golang.org/x/tools/cmd/gopls|golang.org/x/tools/cmd/gopls> $ mkdir a b $ echo &#39;package main\n\nimpo...
